title: Calculate factor prices that maximize profits

content.question: For a certain firm, the marginal revenue product for the last unit of labor is $60, and the marginal revenue product for the last unit of capital is $100. Which of the following combinations of factor prices would be necessary for the firm to maximize profits?

choices.label: Price of Labor Price of Capital $2 $5
Price of Labor Price of Capital $3 $20
Price of Labor Price of Capital $10 $10
Price of Labor Price of Capital $2 $25
Price of Labor Price of Capital $60 $100

content.answer: Price of Labor Price of Capital $60 $100

topic.text: 5.3: Profit-Maximizing Behavior in Perfectly Competitive Factor Markets
